title: Amenities included: gym, sauna, pool, jacuzzi, recreational room°°°
posting_body: ['WE HAVE A RENT TO OWN PROGRAM EASY TO  QUALIFY!', 'Quick move in.', 'If you are an independent worker have low credit or background issues and have problems finding a place to settle with your family, do not hesitate call me or TEXT me, I am a rental expert in South Florida, I will find a property for you and get you approved.', 'WE HAVE A RENT TO OWN PROGRAM with credit score of over 550, we will buy any property CASH for you  up tp $600,000 and then rent it to you for 1 to 3 years until you can get ready to purchase it, it will save some of your rent money towards the purchase ( about 25% of payment).', 'Amazing New Unit Furnished: Overlooking the Bay and City.', 'Internet, Cable and valet.', 'The building is has amazing amenities such as: Gym, Pool, Pet grooming facilities and more.', 'Located in the center of Downtown with access to world famous Restaurants and bars, as well as Beautiful Bayfront Park and Bayside for shopping.', 'CALL ME OR TEXT ME', 'I RESPOND INMIDIATELLY!!', 'show contact info', ')', '""EASY SOLUTIONS REALTY LLC ""']
